data.description: In this game you move using your hands. It has a chill forest map and different cosmetics that you can use to customize your character. Be careful in the scary horror map! You can even go hiking and fight zombies! More gamemodes and features are being added as the game gets frequent updates. Have fun!

changelog.change_log:
- new caves map
- expanded map
- new map decorations
- new horror
- map changes
- more bug fixes

- removed networked hit sounds bc they were broken and annoying
- fixed grab objects so they can be grabbed by everyone now (hopefully)
- fixed bugs such as not being jumpscared when touching the monster
- small additions like the rope and new grab objects

- networked hit sounds
- added more objects you can grab (now networked)
- graphics changes (reflections, bloom and more)
- made some other small changes
- added face movement when talking
- added a message of the day that can be changed without requiring a game update
- added new galaxy beanie cosmetic

- networked hit sounds
- added more objects you can grab (now networked)
- graphics changes (reflections, bloom and more)
- made some other small changes
- added face movement when talking
- added a message of the day that can be changed without requiring a game update

NEW MAP (and more)
NEW MAP (and more)
